About the Company: Sunstar Realty Development Ltd was originally incorporated as Sunstar Realty Development Private Limited on 30th June, 2008. The Status of our Company changed from Private to Public with the name of Sunstar Realty Development Limited with a fresh certificate of incorporation on the 16th of October , 2012, issued by the Registrar of Companies Maharashtra, Mumbai.
